-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | a task management tool for Haskell
--   
@package nemesis
@version 2015.5.4

module System.Nemesis
newtype ShowIO
ShowIO :: IO () -> ShowIO
unShowIO :: ShowIO -> IO ()
data Task
Task :: String -> ShowIO -> [String] -> Maybe String -> [String] -> Task
name :: Task -> String
action :: Task -> ShowIO
deps :: Task -> [String]
description :: Task -> Maybe String
namespace :: Task -> [String]
data Nemesis
Nemesis :: Map String Task -> String -> Maybe String -> [String] -> Nemesis
tasks :: Nemesis -> Map String Task
target :: Nemesis -> String
current_desc :: Nemesis -> Maybe String
current_namespace :: Nemesis -> [String]
full_name :: Task -> String
display_name :: Task -> String
show_task :: Task -> String
type Unit = StateT Nemesis IO ()
show_with_ljust :: Int -> Task -> String
run :: Unit -> IO ()
insert_task :: Task -> Unit
run_nemesis :: Nemesis -> IO ()
instance Ord Task
instance Eq Task
instance Default Nemesis
instance Show Nemesis
instance Default Task
instance Show Task
instance Default ShowIO
instance Show ShowIO

module System.Nemesis.DSL
desc :: String -> Unit
task :: String -> IO () -> Unit
namespace :: String -> Unit -> Unit
sh :: String -> IO ()
clean :: [String] -> Unit

module System.Nemesis.Env
